Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that all charges have been dropped for Kyle Rittenhouse, when in fact he still faces several charges in Wisconsin.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that all charges have been dropped.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the Facebook post is accurate and reliable, without verifying the information.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rittenhouse still faces charges in Wisconsin, including first-degree intentional homicide.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the confusion may stem from the announcement by prosecutors in Lake County, Illinois, that they found no basis to charge Rittenhouse under Illinois laws, which may have been misinterpreted as all charges being dropped.
